front.title: MPLS-TP Shared-Ring protection (MSRP) mechanism for ring topology

abstract.t: This document describes requirements, architecture and solutions for MPLS-TP Shared Ring Protection (MSRP) in the ring topology for point- to-point (P2P) services. The mechanism of MSRP is illustrated and how it satisfies the requirements for optimized ring protection in RFC 5654 is analyzed. This document also defines the Ring Protection Switch (RPS) Protocol which is used to coordinate the protection behavior of the nodes on MPLS ring.
